body_html: @jancborchardt that's a very good point, and I think we can definitely improve that help section to make it more understandable :) The line "If you think something is unclear or should be improved" pointing to the issue tracker meant to suggest opening an issue along the lines of, "it's not very clear how to sign up for an account" or "I think the help page could be improved" rather than direct questions about the program, however reading it now I'm realising that it could be understood in another way. I will improve the wording there, thank you for pointing this out to us. 👍
